content: On the addressbook menu, there is an icon called 'new list' - highlight the addressbook that contains the addresses, click the 'new list' icon, name it, and then you can drag email addresses to it.
creator: davidsk

content: There is an addon, Textmarker, which may resolve your desire for background color. It needs a few minutes to set as desired, but is easy to use.

content: Zde jsem dohledal více informací na toto téma Thundrbird / O365 (Exchange 365): https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/microsoft-oauth-authentication-and-thunderbird-202 Z toho plyne nefunkčnost kalendáře a i po složitém rozchození emailů to může kdykoliv (po úpravách Microsoft) přestat fungovat. Takže Thunerbird pro O365 nelze doporučit.
creator: cerovsky65

content:
You can rearrange columns in the Table View, basically you have a lot more control in Table View.

But there is limited control regarding 'Cards View' , although you can still alter the Sort by and use Group by sort. Bascally what you see is what you get, however, I think the Cards View is still being developed, but nor sure to what extent. I cannot find anything mentioned about offering any options or customisations for altering a specific layout design. There are no columns to rearrange.
creator: Toad-Hall

content: Per funzioni di ricerca evolute (comprese le espressioni regolari) puoi installare delle estensioni, come ad esempio questa -> https://addons.thunderbird.net/it/thunderbird/addon/expression-search-ng/?src=ss

content: Is this your gmail contact list? If so, - click to addressbook pane - click 'new addressbook' - click 'cardDAV address book' - enter gmail address on top line and then click 'continue' - Google will prompt for email address and password and will then authenticate the addressbook for use in thunderbird.
creator: davidsk

content: Your reference to Google caused me to infer gmail. For outlook, I believe you can select 'home', and the 'people' icon appears in left sidebar and, after clicking, the 'manage' option appears in upper right where you can export the addressbook.

content: I think there was no response to first post was because it had a confusing statement about a record problem. There are more requests than there are helpers, so we tend to focus on the ones where we have some idea of the problem. Please post full info on error message and screenshot of your incoming server settings. Is this a business domain? If so, who is the email provider who is providing the email service? Thank you.
creator: davidsk

content: Now I see; you are referring to the 'replied to' and 'forwarded to' icons. This link may help. That is, it increases the size of the message list content, and that may also increase size of those icons. https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1428118#answer-1612208
creator: davidsk

content:
This is the most recent fix for that for which I am aware:

Go to tools>Developertools>error console - enter this text 

   openDialog("chrome://pippki/content/resetpassword.xhtml")

- the Reset button should appear. All passwords for accounts will be deleted
creator: davidsk
